name: Floodland: Relics of the Old
description:
Relicts of the old:

Floodland - Full Game
A society survival game, set in world destroyed by climate change. Explore, scavenge and build a settlement to unite the clans. Conflicting cultures and limited resources mean you need to make tough choices; have you got what it takes to lead your people into a new era of humanity?

Official Soundtrack
Delve into a world destroyed by climate change while enjoying the deep, melodic and emotionally charged music. Composed by Neil Haverty and Misha Bower, together with Piotr Musiał and Paweł Wawrzeńczyk.
As a bonus, we have included 6 wallpapers for you to decorate your PC and phone.

Story & Artbook
Explore the art of Floodland - and its dystopian optimism - in greater depth, from concept drawings through to full implementation. Together with a collection of short stories, written by an experienced fantasy author, you'll get a deeper insight into the events and world you and the survivors of Floodland inhabit.
